text: Ej mu'minon, on cunon ki jakdigarro nido mekuned, pajomʙarro nido nakuned (ja'ne jo Muhammad nagued, ʙalki ʙo ehtiromu izzat ʙa in lafz ej pajomʙari Alloh, jo rasulalloh ʙigued). Alʙatta, Alloh medonad onhoero, ki pinhoni ʙerun mesavand az nazdi Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam. Bojad ki ʙitarsand onhoe, ki xilofi hukmi pajomʙar kor mekunand az in ki ʙirasad ʙa onho ʙa saʙaʙi xilofkoriason ʙalovu musiʙate jo ʙirasad ʙa onho azoʙi dardnok
